dc_description_s: Pictoral map of the Rutgers University campuses in New Brunswick, N.J. including the College Avenue campus, New Jersey College for Women (now the Douglass campus) and the River Road campus (now Busch campus). Insets of details of College Avenue and Douglass campuses. Drawn illustrations of Old Queens building, Rutgers Gymnasium and the Voorhees Chapel. Directories for buildings on each campus. Drawn by Charles C. Stover, Rutgers Class of 1913.
